name: 【Processing】Incremental Dyson Swarm
description:
Incremental Dyson Swarm is an incremental game experiments with mechanics-driven text based storytelling. Your effort to collect materials to survive evolves into a revolution in robot ethics, and, at the final stage, building a megastructure. The game takes a symbolized approach and minimalist style to deliver a unique storysense gameplay experience.

A  Neurath Award game design work, nominated for Outstanding Design Inquiry.

Thesis Work 2021 - Northeastern University - Game Science and Design Link: https://repository.library.northeastern.edu/files/neu:bz617n08c
